name: Zombie Murder (itch)
description:
simple HTML5 and JavaScript Game in Beta stages. THIS GAME ONLY WORKS IN FIREFOX!!!

Zombie Murder is a HTML5 and JavaScript shooter that includes 3 fun Game modes:

- Competition Mode

- Classic Mode

- God Mode

Competition and God Mode have a lot of features, and are very fun to play. Classic mode was a test to see if the game worked.

Donations and suggestions are greatly appreciated.

Have Fun Shooting! ;-)

DO NOT STEAL MY GAME!!! IF I SEE THIS GAME UPLOADED UNCHANGED, IT WILL BE REPORTED BY ME!!!
